segments.text: What do you feel like eating this morning ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I usually just have a bowl of cereal .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The most important meal of the day is breakfast .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , but I don't usually have time to eat a big breakfast .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can always make an easy breakfast .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All I make is oatmeal , toast , and some orange juice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like it , and it's a fast meal .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is a very quick meal to make .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can make it for you if you like .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oatmeal and toast sounds good to me .
segments.speaker: S2
